Pan Zhou

I am currently a first-year Ph.D. student at National University of Singapore (NUS), fortunately advised by Dr. Jiashi Feng and Dr. Shuicheng Yan. Before studying in NUS, I graduated from Peking University (PKU) in 2016 and during this period of time, I was fortunately directed by Dr. Zhouchen Lin and Dr. Chao Zhang.

 

Research Topics

Noncovex/convex optimization, deep learning, compressed sensing, etc.
